urls.title: Home
urls.description: This website is made by BBC Studios Distribution. BBC Studios is a commercial company that is owned by the BBC (and just the BBC). No money from the licence fee was used to create this website. The profits we make from it go back to BBC programme-makers to help fund great new BBC programmes. BBC is a trademark of the British Broadcasting Corporation. Logos ©

urls.title: Casualty to air format-breaking improvised episode
urls.description: The world’s longest running primetime medical drama, will air its first ever improvised episode this weekend on BBC One and iPlayer, produced by BBC Studios.

tweets.text:
🚑 @BBCCasualty to air first-ever improvised episode.

Paramedics are pushed to breaking point in an improvised episode of the world’s longest running primetime medical drama, produced by @BBCStudios.

📺 Sat 10 December on @BBCOne & @BBCiPlayer.

https://t.co/4W9gGAn2ao https://t.co/5lsjqk5f3I
Massive congratulations to the lovely @SelmaBlair for her @peopleschoice awards win! 💃⭐️🤩 https://t.co/4m9LQsmAbs

The Dragons are back with Business Thursdays! Catch @SaraDaviesCC,@DeborahMeaden,@SteveBartlettSC, @dragonjones & @ToukerSuleyman investing their money into a batch of new budding entrepreneurs 💵 
 
Watch #DragonsDen on @bbciplayer from 5 Jan. https://t.co/fbGgeqdC6O
We were thrilled to win the Outstanding Contribution award last night! @bbcstudios #RTSAwards https://t.co/t05aZG2GeL

Congratulations to BBC Studios' scripted indie labels @LookoutPointTV (Gentleman Jack) and @ClerkenwellFilm (Cheaters), and to our indie partners at @ExpectationEnt1 (Alma's Not Normal) who all won @RTS_media Craft & Design Awards last night. https://t.co/Ih9qBnksUb

The @BBCS_Events Team's work on the Platinum Party at the Palace took home two @RTS_media Craft & Design Awards, whilst the Natural History Unit and Entertainment Productions won for The Green Planet and @BBCStrictly, respectively. https://t.co/zIYeW9m1Sp

Congratulations to Claire Popplewell and the @BBCS_Events Team, last night their work in delivering exceptional coverage of events including this year's Platinum Jubilee celebrations was recognised with the Outstanding Contribution Award at the @RTS_media Craft & Design Awards. https://t.co/2Qjp9QSEhX
The next award goes to Nigel Catmur (@ncatmur) for the “epic but beautifully detailed” Lighting for Multicamera for @bbcstudios’ Platinum Party at the Palace #RTSAwards https://t.co/mSIDw0eR3m

Julia Knowles takes home the second award for @bbcstudios’ Platinum Party at the Palace for Director – Multicamera for the “ground breaking and truly memorable” event. Congratulations! #RTSAwards https://t.co/TEatwsaULp

Claire Popplewell & the @bbcstudios Events Team win the Outstanding Contribution Award for harnessing “the great power of live television to bring people together to witness some of the most important events in history” including Live 8 and Queen Elizabeth II’s funeral #RTSAwards https://t.co/XFj1zTYsGo

The award for Photography - Documentary/Factual & Non Drama goes to Tim Shepherd, Todd Kewley, Oliver Mueller & Camera Team for The Green Planet. The judges praised the “innovative, clever and technically impressive work” - well done to the team! #RTSAwards https://t.co/1MbXf9bqSG

.@lisaAmakeup & Lisa Davey take home the Make Up Design – Entertainment & Non Drama award for their “astonishing, phenomenal and amazing” work on Strictly Come Dancing Series 19 #RTSAwards @bbcstrictly https://t.co/EtV2JUmzNz
💙💙➕🎬 Action! Filming has officially begun today for the next series of #DoctorWho. https://t.co/SQU0SbPJSb
What a team 🥰🥰🥰 https://t.co/P4M8UwYgpf
